xml.data:
Home » 39P4 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4) » 8 Tika, Saraṇaduka » 8.5 Saṃkiliṭṭhattika, Saraṇaduka » 8.5.1--7 Paṭiccādivāra » Paccayacatukka
Hetu
Tika, Saraṇaduka
Saṃkiliṭṭhattika, Saraṇaduka
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Hetu
18.
1755Saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ saraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1756Hetuyā ekaṃ…pe…  avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1757(Sahajātavārepi…pe…  pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṃ.)
19.
1758Asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ araṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
1759Asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikaṃ araṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesiko araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  tīṇi.
1760Asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ araṇañca asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikaṃ araṇañca dhammaṃ paṭicca asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
20.
1761Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve…pe…  avigate pañca. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) (Sahajātavārampi…pe…  sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṃ.)
21.
1762Asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko araṇo dhammo asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
1763Asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesiko araṇo dhammo asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
22.
1764Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā…pe…  samanantare cattāri, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte pacchājāte āsevane dve, kamme…pe…  magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi…pe…  avigate satta. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1765(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṃ, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)
